sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-alert
      border="left"
      close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="show"
    >
      Thêm thành công!
    </v-alert>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="font">Thêm Thành Viên</v-card-title>
            
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitUser"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.name"
              label="Tên người dùng"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            
            <v-radio-group v-model="users.gender" mandatory row label="Giới tính"></label>
              <v-radio label="Nam" value="M" ></v-radio>
              <v-radio label="Nữ" value="F"></v-radio>
            </v-radio-group>
            <v-text-field v-model="users.email" label="Email" :rules="rules">
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.password"
              label="Mật khẩu"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">add</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "@/services/api.user";
export default {
  name: "add-user",
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is required"],
      users: {
        name: "",
        gender: "",
        email: "",
        password: "",
      },
      show: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async submitUser() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("name", this.users.name);
      formData.append("gender", this.users.gender);
      formData.append("email", this.users.email);
      formData.append("password", this.users.password);

      // console.log(formData.all); 

//       for (const value of formData.values()) {
//   console.log(value);
// }
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
       
        const result = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/user", {
        name: this.users.name,
        gender: this.users.gender,
        email: this.users.email,
        password: this.users.password,
      });

      
      // if (res) {
        //   this.show = true;
        //   this.$refs.form.reset();
        // }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style lang="">

</style>
